sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISCHARGEPORTID as "dischargeportid", DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "dischargeportname", DISCHARGEPORTCODE as "dischargeportcode", ISFORMAL as "isformal", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", MONITORID as "monitorid", SIGNFORM as "signform", DISCHARGEMODE as "dischargemode", LONGITUDE as "longitude", LATITUDE as "latitude", POSITION as "position", EXECUTIONSTANDARD as "executionstandard", SETRIGHT as "setright", IMPORTANTPORT as "importantport", ISMAP as "ismap", DESCRIPTION as "description", OUTTO as "outto", OUTTYPE as "outtype", OUTRULE as "outrule", EXHAUSTHEIGHT as "exhaustheight", EXHAUSTINSIDE as "exhaustinside", COUNTRYPOINT as "countrypoint", CITYPOINT as "citypoint", COMPANYPOINT as "companypoint", CLEANPOINT as "cleanpoint", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime", PORT_TEMPERATURE as "portTemperature", DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY as "dischargeClassify", CONTROL_POINT as "controlPoint", DISCHARGE_STATUS as "dischargeStatus" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT WHERE 1=1
DISCHARGEPORTID = #dischargeportid#
CONTROL_POINT = #controlPoint#
DISCHARGE_STATUS = #dischargeStatus#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
DEPARTID = #departid#
PROCID = #procid#
DISCHARGEPORTCODE like '%$dischargeportcode$%'
DISCHARGEPORTNAME like '%$dischargeportname$%'
ISFORMAL = #isformal#
STATUS = #status#
DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY IN
#dischargeClassify[]#
$orderBy$
dischargeportcode asc

SELECT DISCHARGEPORTID as "dischargeportid", DISCHARGEPORTCODE as "dischargeportcode", DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "dischargeportname", ISFORMAL as "isformal", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", MONITORID as "monitorid", SIGNFORM as "signform", DISCHARGEMODE as "dischargemode", LONGITUDE as "longitude", LATITUDE as "latitude", POSITION as "position", EXECUTIONSTANDARD as "executionstandard", SETRIGHT as "setright", IMPORTANTPORT as "importantport", ISMAP as "ismap", DESCRIPTION as "description", OUTTO as "outto", OUTTYPE as "outtype", OUTRULE as "outrule", EXHAUSTHEIGHT as "exhaustheight", EXHAUSTINSIDE as "exhaustinside", COUNTRYPOINT as "countrypoint", CITYPOINT as "citypoint", COMPANYPOINT as "companypoint", CLEANPOINT as "cleanpoint", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime", PORT_TEMPERATURE as "portTemperature", DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY as "dischargeClassify" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT order by DISCHARGEPORTID desc fetch first 1 rows only

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT WHERE 1=1
DISCHARGEPORTID = #dischargeportid#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
DEPARTID = #departid#
PROCID = #procid#
DISCHARGEPORTCODE like '%$dischargeportcode$%'
DISCHARGEPORTNAME like '%$dischargeportname$%'

SELECT t1.DISCHARGEPORTID as "dischargeportid", t1.DISCHARGEPORTCODE as "dischargeportcode", t1.DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "dischargeportname", t1.DEPARTID as "departid", t1.PROCID as "procid", t1.MONITORID as "monitorid", t1.DISCHARGEMODE as "dischargemode", t1.STATUS as "status" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HA_SITE t2 ON t1.DISCHARGEPORTID = t2.PORTID WHERE 1=1
t2.SITEID = #siteid#
$orderBy$
DISCHARGEPORTID asc
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT (DISCHARGEPORTID, DISCHARGEPORTNAME,
PROCID, MONITORID, SIGNFORM, DISCHARGEMODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, POSITION, EXECUTIONSTANDARD, SETRIGHT, IMPORTANTPORT, ISMAP, DESCRIPTION, OUTTO, OUTTYPE, OUTRULE, COUNTRYPOINT, CITYPOINT, COMPANYPOINT, CLEANPOINT, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED_TIME, MODIFIER, UPDATED_TIME, DISCHARGEPORTCODE, DEPARTID, EXHAUSTHEIGHT, EXHAUSTINSIDE, PORT_TEMPERATURE, DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY, CONTROL_POINT, DISCHARGE_STATUS ) VALUES (#dischargeportid:VARCHAR#, #dischargeportname:VARCHAR#, #procid:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #signform:VARCHAR#, #dischargemode:VARCHAR#, #longitude:VARCHAR#, #latitude:VARCHAR#, #position:VARCHAR#, #executionstandard:VARCHAR#, #setright:VARCHAR#, #importantport:VARCHAR#, #ismap:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #outto:VARCHAR#, #outtype:VARCHAR#, #outrule:VARCHAR#, #countrypoint:VARCHAR#, #citypoint:VARCHAR#, #companypoint:VARCHAR#, #cleanpoint:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #creator:VARCHAR#, #createdTime:VARCHAR#, #modifier:VARCHAR#, #updatedTime:VARCHAR#, #dischargeportcode:VARCHAR#, #departid:VARCHAR#, #exhaustheight:VARCHAR#, #exhaustinside:VARCHAR#, #portTemperature:VARCHAR#, #dischargeClassify:VARCHAR#,#controlPoint:VARCHAR#,#dischargeStatus:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT SET DISCHARGEPORTNAME = #dischargeportname#, ISFORMAL = #isformal#, PROCID = #procid#, MONITORID = #monitorid#, SIGNFORM = #signform#, DISCHARGEMODE = #dischargemode#, LONGITUDE = #longitude#, LATITUDE = #latitude#, POSITION = #position#, EXECUTIONSTANDARD = #executionstandard#, SETRIGHT = #setright#, IMPORTANTPORT = #importantport#, ISMAP = #ismap#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, OUTTO = #outto#, OUTTYPE = #outtype#, OUTRULE = #outrule#, COUNTRYPOINT = #countrypoint#, CITYPOINT = #citypoint#, COMPANYPOINT = #companypoint#, CLEANPOINT = #cleanpoint#, STATUS = #status#, CREATOR = #creator#, CREATED_TIME = #createdTime#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime#, DISCHARGEPORTCODE = #dischargeportcode#, DEPARTID = #departid#, EXHAUSTHEIGHT = #exhaustheight#, EXHAUSTINSIDE = #exhaustinside#, PORT_TEMPERATURE = #portTemperature#, DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY = #dischargeClassify#, CONTROL_POINT = #controlPoint#, DISCHARGE_STATUS = #dischargeStatus# WHERE DISCHARGEPORTID = #dischargeportid#

UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT SET DISCHARGEPORTNAME = #dischargeportname#,
PROCID = #procid#, MONITORID = #monitorid#, SIGNFORM = #signform#, DISCHARGEMODE = #dischargemode#, LONGITUDE = #longitude#, LATITUDE = #latitude#, POSITION = #position#, EXECUTIONSTANDARD = #executionstandard#, SETRIGHT = #setright#,
ISMAP = #ismap#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, OUTTO = #outto#, OUTTYPE = #outtype#, OUTRULE = #outrule#, COUNTRYPOINT = #countrypoint#, CITYPOINT = #citypoint#, COMPANYPOINT = #companypoint#, CLEANPOINT = #cleanpoint#, STATUS = #status#, MODIFIER = #modifier#, UPDATED_TIME = #updatedTime#, DISCHARGEPORTCODE = #dischargeportcode#, DEPARTID = #departid#, EXHAUSTHEIGHT = #exhaustheight#, EXHAUSTINSIDE = #exhaustinside#, PORT_TEMPERATURE = #portTemperature#, DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY = #dischargeClassify#, CONTROL_POINT = #controlPoint#, DISCHARGE_STATUS = #dischargeStatus# WHERE DISCHARGEPORTID = #dischargeportid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISCHARGEPORTID as "dischargeportid", DISCHARGEPORTNAME as "dischargeportname", DISCHARGEPORTCODE as "dischargeportcode", ISFORMAL as "isformal", DEPARTID as "departid", PROCID as "procid", MONITORID as "monitorid", SIGNFORM as "signform", DISCHARGEMODE as "dischargemode", LONGITUDE as "longitude", LATITUDE as "latitude", POSITION as "position", EXECUTIONSTANDARD as "executionstandard", SETRIGHT as "setright", IMPORTANTPORT as "importantport", ISMAP as "ismap", DESCRIPTION as "description", OUTTO as "outto", OUTTYPE as "outtype", OUTRULE as "outrule", EXHAUSTHEIGHT as "exhaustheight", EXHAUSTINSIDE as "exhaustinside", COUNTRYPOINT as "countrypoint", CITYPOINT as "citypoint", COMPANYPOINT as "companypoint", CLEANPOINT as "cleanpoint", STATUS as "status", CREATOR as "creator", CREATED_TIME as "createdTime", MODIFIER as "modifier", UPDATED_TIME as "updatedTime", PORT_TEMPERATURE as "portTemperature", DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY as "dischargeClassify" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HA_DISCHARGEPORT WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS = '1'
MONITORID = #monitorid#
ISFORMAL = #isformal#
DISCHARGE_CLASSIFY != #dischargeClassify#
